page.title: 04Resident of New Tockwith.
page.content: Interview with{Mrs. Crannage,}a resident on the new housing estate in Tockwith. {Mrs. Crannage}has lived on the estate with her husband and two children for four and a half years. Before this, she lived in{Leeds,}a city 20 miles away. She moved to Tockwith to live in the country.{Mrs. {Crannage}has moved three times since she was married. She moved because her husband's workplace has changed. Her husband is now working in{Oman} in the Middle East. He comes home every 4 months.{Mrs. Crannage}and her two children are now planning to move to{Oman}for a year, as her husband has a new contract enabling him to have his family with him. The children will go to an English independent school there. They may stay longer if they like it.
